name: Little Potioneer
description:
Game prototype developed for a gamejam called Jamcraft 2. The theme of the gamejam was game based around crafting. The game is about brewing magic potions to make money and help an adventurer complete her quest for treasure.

A few tips for finding recipes in the game:

1. The order ingredients are put in the pot does not matter

2. No recipe has 3 of the same ingredient.

3. There is a lesser and greater version of each potion. Two ingredients are always the same for the regular, lesser and greater version of the same potion.

4. A lot of recipes have two of the same ingredient.
